about: Staff-level analytics and AI engineer focused on building reliable data pipelines, experimentation systems, and AI-enabled applications that drive strategy.
proofBullets: Business Analyst III at Cisco via TEKsystems (Sep 2025-present), focused on analytics and experimentation.
Built CMS FWA data engineering workflows at Peraton (Sep 2024-Sep 2025) for fraud, waste, and abuse programs.
Hands-on across SQL/Python/dbt/Snowflake/AWS with GenAI accelerators for delivery velocity.

experience.title: Business Analyst III
highlights: Leads analytics initiatives aligned to product and business decision-making.
Implements experimentation methods and statistical evaluation for strategic tests.

experience.title: Data Engineer
highlights: Built and maintained fraud, waste, and abuse-focused data pipelines.
Improved reliability and traceability of downstream analytics datasets.

experience.title: Freelance Python Developer
highlights: Delivered automation and analytics tooling for client operations.
Built custom reporting and ETL workflows across diverse domains.

experience.title: Data Analyst -> Marketing Data Scientist -> Senior Data Scientist -> Data Engineer
highlights: Progressed through analytics and data science roles into engineering ownership.
Supported marketing and product measurement with statistically grounded analysis.

experience.title: Analyst
highlights: Delivered analytical reporting and process support across business operations.

experience.title: Analyst
highlights: Supported performance analysis and operational data workflows.
